description: OAuthTemplates allow for customization of pages like the login page

error.description: Error is a path to a file containing a go template used to render error pages during the authentication or grant flow If unspecified, the default error page is used.

login.description: Login is a path to a file containing a go template used to render the login page. If unspecified, the default login page is used.

providerSelection.description: ProviderSelection is a path to a file containing a go template used to render the provider selection page. If unspecified, the default provider selection page is used.
